div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: This notice directs visitors to the News Section of our website for access to a page on all updates for COVID-19

div.h3: Reed City Area Public Schools, about 3 hours ago
div.p: Attention 8th grade families: this link will take you to the virtual 8th Grade High School Information Night Presentation. Please check it out!

div.p: Chromebooks fill out this form - j.mp/rc2020cb - HS Gym Pickup
Packets - GT packets are at GT - - MS/HS at HS Gym
**Food Pickup** Please open your trunk/hatch to receive your meal(s) in the high school pickup line.
There will NOT be a pickup this FRIDAY - 1 WEEK of FOOD TODAY!

div.h3: Reed City Area Public Schools, 1 day ago
div.p: Senior Families - - Please see the link to a letter from Mr. Hudson and Mrs. Shoemaker with important updates. #CoyoteStrong #Seniors2020

div.h3: Reed City Area Public Schools, 1 day ago
div.p: Parents, this one is for you!
The head of schools, for Virginia Chance schools, posted some helpful tips for parents in this difficult time.
Grace over Guilt-We know this is a difficult time, but you are doing a great job. We see you working hard!
6 strategies will follow, one each day.
